original_title: Red River Rivalry: Texas vs. Oklahoma
overview: The University of Oklahoma and the University of Texas -- two of the nation's most competitive college football foes -- clash in this retrospective collection of uncut interviews and game clips spanning 1969 to 2001 that documents the teams' long-standing "Red River" rivalry. Featured personalities include Barry Switzer, Darrell Royal, Mack Brown, Bob Stoops, Steve Owens, Tommy Nobis, James Street and Billy Simms.
title: Red River Rivalry: Texas vs. Oklahoma
